metadata.title: CVE-2020-11095 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, an out of bound reads occurs resulting in accessing a memory location that is outside of the boundaries of the static array PRIMARY_DRAWING_ORDER_FIELD_BYTES. This is fixed in version 2.1.2.

notes.note: mdeslaur> The freerdp package in Ubuntu 16.04 LTS and Ubuntu 18.04 LTS does not build a server library. This is simply a client denial of service that has a negligible security impact.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.0+dfsg1-1').
